//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "sec_talker", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_TASK_FLUSH", "ON" );
	set ( "SET_FORCE_SCRIPT", "ON" );
	set ( "SET_ATTACK", "ON" );

	task ( "beal" )
	{
		set ( "SET_TASK_SPEED", "9 - FastRun" );
		set ( "SET_TASK", "Path" );
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "sec_spot" );
	}

	dowait ( "beal" );
	set ( "SET_FORCE_SCRIPT", "OFF" );
	set ( "SET_TASK_FLUSH", "ON" );
	flush (  );
}
